text:
So this was request back in 2017 on the ideas forum but it looks like it never got traction, is there any update on HubSpot giving us this potential?
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Flexible-Column-in-Blog-Posts/idi-p/20603>
For real, if flexible columns were allowed in blogs, this would be amazing. I'd be happy to provide examples for a use case if needed.
<@U3VN3LMME> not sure if there are any plans for this or not.

I added an idea for the ability to preview the "Blog Author Page" here, it's a little weird that it's not an option yet: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-a-preview-for-for-Blog-Author-Page/idi-p/264212>
Heya! We're investigating this (making blog content areas drag and drop-able) but not exactly with Flexible Columns. The functionality is certainly on the radar.
I'd love to help beta test this when its open for it
